title: Idlewild - 3 Albums (Hope Is Important, The Remote Part, Warning
description:
3 IDLEWILD ALBUMS


THE REMOTE PART:

1. You Held The World In Your Arms 
2. A Modern Way Of Letting Go             
3. American English           
4. I Never Wanted          
5. (I Am) What I Am Not             
6. Live In A Hiding Place            
7. Out Of Routine          
8. Century After Century             
9. Tell Me Ten Words             
10. Stay The Same              
11. In Remote Part/Scottish Fiction 


HOPE IS IMPORTANT:

1 You've Lost Your Way 
2.Film for the Future  
3 Paint Nothing  
4 When I Argue I See Shapes  
5 4 People Do Good  
6 I'm Happy to Be Here Tonight  
7 Everyone Says You're So Fragile  
8 I'm a Message  
9 You Don't Have the Heart  
10 Close the Door  
11 Safe and Sound  
12 Low Light 


WARNINGS/PROMISES:

 1. Love Steals Us From Loneliness 
 2. Welcome Home 
 3. I Want A Warning 
 4. I Understand It 
 5. As If I Hadn't Slept 
 6. Too Long Awake 
 7. Not Just Sometimes But Always               
 8. The Space Between All Things               
 9. El Capitan               
 10. Blame It On Obvious Ways               
 11. Disconnected               
 12. Goodnight (Contains Hidden Track 'Too Long Awake (Reprise)') 


WHEN YOU'VE FINISHED DOWNLOADING, PLEASE SEED AND SHARE SOME LOVE.
